::Windlord::

"Yes... in few time we're grow up" he replied while he helped at 
Nightlight to walk nd leaded her cr. 
 
--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Eh?  Yawn.  That felt good.  I'll be fine I have a bit of 
energy to 
> spare.  I need so much energy because of my shall we say 
interesting 
> physiology.  The changing forms takes a lot of energy because my 
transforming 
> protocols are a bit haywire.  But the extra energy comes in handy 
sometimes 
> so I think I like the way I am."  He looks around and sees Gramps 
holding the 
> frog.  "So you're choosing your forms now good.  Our group is 
getting quite 
> large isn't it Windlord.  Too many more people join us and we'll 
need to come 
> up with a name for it."
